Installation instructions, read carefully:
1) Run the game, Main Menu -> Advanced -> Settings -> Online, put both rooks on the "No", leave the game.
2) Close to the firewall access to the Inet following files: MassEffect2Launcher.exe and MassEffect2.exe (you can skip this paragraph).
3) Set the DLC Pack 2010, link below (fully automatic installation odnoklikovaya);
4) We put a fix activator
5) Run the game - everything should work (we go by boat to change the appearance and there will be new armor and weapons).

NoCD / NoDVD + Keygen v1.0 EN/ RU [XP / Vista / 7]{Razor 1911}
Installation Procedure:
1. Mount dvd1.iso
2. Set the game.
During installation, generate and enter the key (keygen in the folder Razor1911).
At the request of the second disk mount dvd2.iso and continue the installation.
3. Copy the replacement file MassEffect2.exe (from the folder Razor1911) in folder Binaries (located in the folder with a game).
4. Play. 
http://shareflare.net/download/5809.5e90581b2fe31a7fa1982d02f/Mass_Effect_2_NoDVD_Keygen.exe.html

I have 2 folders: DAD 1 and DVD 2, full of  "rzr-me2b.001" type files. No executable, no instructions, thankfully no virus but i would like ot have not just wasted 14.3GB of my internet credit and time... any help?

Here, i downloaded it and gt the same error with the .001, .002... files, so I joined them with hjsplit. But that didn't work, so I had to rename all the files from rzr-me2a(or 2b) to rzrme2a.r00, r01,r02. A great way to do this is to change the first zero to an "r". when you finish just extract the first file with winrar. That worked for me.
By the way, if you change the name of the files, you won't be able to upload it anymore, so if you want to keep uploading, just make a copy of it in another paste and rename this new copy.
I hope that helped. Sorry for the english mistakes.

This torrent sucks! You can extract the files .001, .002, .003, and so it goes, with 7-Zip. But inside there are two other files: rzr-me2a and rzr-me2b. I've tried Alcohol 120%, Winrar, 7-Zip, Poweriso, Demon Tools... and none works. Do yourself a favor and search other torrent. Don't waste your time with this one.

For those with 001 problems do like mattheusvelosod, change the first 0 from rzr-me2a(or 2b).001 to rzrme2a.r01, r02,r03, it will recognize as a Rar file, don't worry if when u get to r30 appear that didn't recognize because it did, after that unzip the first one that all other files will be packed into a ISO file, after that mount and good game.
